alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 2:40PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prowers and eastern Kiowa Counties through 315 PM MST... At 239 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Lamar, moving northeast at 70 mph. Strong winds are already occuring in the area, but these thunderstorms could enhance winds further, and wind gusts up to 70 mph may be possible. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Sheridan Lake and Brandon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County
